  • Constructor Details

    • Buyable

      public Buyable(String setName, int price)
      Constructor that is called by the subclasses to set pricing information and name. The base purchase price is increased or decreased in line with game difficulty, and the sale price is set as half of the purchase price.
      Parameters:
      setName - string describing the athlete or item
      price - sets the base price for the athlete or item

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)

    • getContractPrice

      public long getContractPrice()

    • getBuyBackPrice

      public long getBuyBackPrice()

    • toggleBuyBack

      public void toggleBuyBack()
      Sets the sale price to be the same as the purchase price, or back to half if this is already active. This is used during the initial Team setup so that the Player can buy and sell athletes freely without losing money.
